Text:
Afaik, this its not imax version, imax version its full screen at 16:9 widescreen, which its this version its not.. it still have black borders.

Thanks anyways :)

This release features the majority of the film in its standard 2.39:1 aspect ratio - the same as the standard and widely-available Blu-ray release of the film - but offers select scenes in a "full screen" 1.78:1 (16:9) aspect. Though it takes more than 50 minutes to arrive at the first IMAX sequence, the wait is well worth it.
